desc: Family owned and operated since 1973, @abacusfurniture specializes in custom wood furniture that is made on site. Design your own furniture right here in the city. Residential or commercial, we do it all. We also carry a wide variety of custom Canadian made sofas, antler chandeliers and Premium patio furniture.

layout.text: Please note due to high demand ETA's have changed. Please read our COVID19 Statement for more details.
